item.title: DP Series - The Rod Cutting Problem
item.description: Given that selling a rod of length i yields a profit of pi , how do we cut a rod of length n to maximize the total revenue? Method 1: Recursion The most straightforward approach is to solve it using recursion. As shown in the figure below, rn represents the maximum revenue obtainable by cutting a rod of length n.
